text: Ukrainian Academy of Sciences (UAN; Українська академія наук) is a public organization that positions itself as an association of scientists and production workers of Ukraine. Founded in 1991. It is the legal successor of the Ukrainian Academy of Sciences of National Progress. According to the Academician of the National Academy of Sciences of Ukraine, the President of the , the public organization "UAN" has no known scientific achievements. According to an experiment conducted by journalist Irina Kovalenko in February 2017, one can get a certificate of a “member of the Ukrainian Academy of Sciences” by paying “for a vacancy” an amount equivalent to $300.Коваленко I. «Десятка» — і ти членкор «Академії наук» // Expres.ua, 08.02.2017 UAN includes structures (for example, military-cossack department) that are called "funny" in the media.Ганна Трегуб. Наукова фантастика // Український тиждень № 5 (377), 05.02.2015 ==References == ===Notes=== ===Sources=== * В Украине создали фейковую "академию наук" и раздают дипломы Category:Professional associations based in Ukraine Category:Unaccredited institutions of higher learning Category:1991 establishments in Ukraine
title: Ukrainian Academy of Sciences (non-governmental organization)
